name: APT Package Manager
description: Install packages using APT package manager on Debian-like systems

packages.description: Comma-separated list of package names to install (e.g., 'curl,git,vim,htop')

cleanCache.description: Remove APT cache after package installation to reduce image size

updatePackageList.description: Update package list before installing packages

upgradePackages.description: Upgrade existing packages before installing new ones
